mapper.insert: insert into sys_permission(id, permission_code, permission_name) values (#{id}, #{permissionCode}, #{permissionName})
mapper.update:
update sys_permission
permission_code = #{permissionCode},
permission_name = #{permissionName},
where id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT p.id,p.permission_code,p.permission_name FROM sys_user AS u LEFT JOIN sys_user_role AS ur ON u.id = ur.uid LEFT JOIN sys_role AS r ON r.id = ur.rid LEFT JOIN sys_role_permission AS rp ON r.id = rp.rid LEFT JOIN sys_permission AS p ON p.id = rp.permission_id WHERE u.id = #{userId}
SELECT pe.id,pe.permission_code,pe.permission_name FROM sys_permission pe LEFT JOIN sys_path_permission re ON re.permission_id = pe.id LEFT JOIN sys_path pa ON pa.id = re.url_id WHERE pa.url = #{url}
